name: Zombie Parkour FPS RPG Thingy
description:
Just a teaser demo. This is the project I'll be working on until December 31st 2021. It will be an RPG survival game where you must gather resources and build during the day while fending off zombie/mutants at night.

What you're looking at is 5 days progress. So far there is only one gun and some movement mechanics to play around with. Kill all the mannequins and have uh... running mannequins that chase you? 

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrows

LMB to shoot

RMB to aim down sight

R to reload

F to interact

E to Melee

ESC to do settings and quit

Thank you for checking out my game :)
